name: Accountant The Game
description:
"What do you want to be when you grow up?" A teacher asks.

"I want to be an accountant!"

Well, even if you have a CPA, you could be considered overqualified for almost all positions that require accounting work. Simply put, accountants that appear smarter than a company's executives do not tend to be very marketable to shareholders.

But, good news! Even if you do not have a CPA, you can still roleplay in the life of an accountant! Immerse yourself in this minigame over the span of five days living life as an accounting professional!

"You should play Accountant the Game first!" The teacher responds.

Instructions:

Point and click inside the game screen with your mouse.
